["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["$r","strong",null,{"children":"请注意，CentOS 8（非 Stream 版）已提前进入 EOL 停止服务阶段，因此镜像已被官方移动。如果您正在寻找关于这些系统的镜像，请参考 centos-vault 的帮助。"}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["该文件夹只提供 CentOS 7 与 8，架构仅为 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"x86_64"}]," ，如果需要较早版本的 CentOS，请参考 centos-vault 的帮助，若需要其他架构，请参考 centos-altarch 的帮助。"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"# 对于 CentOS 7
{{sudo}}sed -e 's|^mirrorlist=|#mirrorlist=|g' \
         -e 's|^#baseurl=http://mirror.centos.org/centos|baseurl={{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}|g' \
         -i.bak \
         /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-*.repo

# 对于 CentOS 8
{{sudo}}sed -e 's|^mirrorlist=|#mirrorlist=|g' \
         -e 's|^#baseurl=http://mirror.centos.org/$contentdir|baseurl={{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}|g' \
         -i.bak \
         /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-*.repo","codeLanguage":"shell"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["注意其中的",["$r","code",null,{"children":"*"}],"通配符，如果只需要替换一些文件中的源，请自行增删。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["注意，如果需要启用其中一些 repo，需要将其中的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"enabled=0"}]," 改为 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"enabled=1"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"最后，更新软件包缓存"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}yum makecache","codeLanguage":"shell"}]]}]
